UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores public information about a user.

subscriptionStatus.description: The current status of the user's subscription.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

termsAccepted.description: Indicates whether the user has accepted the terms and conditions.

termsAcceptedAt.description: The timestamp when the user accepted the terms and conditions.

LinkConfig.title: LinkConfig
LinkConfig.description: Stores application affiliate and support links.

hotmartUrl.description: The affiliate link for the Hotmart product.

exnovaUrl.description: The affiliate link for the Exnova broker.

iqOptionUrl.description: The affiliate link for the IQ Option broker.

telegramUrl.description: The link to the support group on Telegram.

LimitConfig.title: LimitConfig
LimitConfig.description: Stores usage limits for the application.

hourlySignalLimit.description: The number of signals a non-premium user can generate per hour.

TimeConfig.title: Time Config
TimeConfig.description: Stores the signal generation wait times for different user tiers.

vipMinWait.description: The minimum wait time in minutes for VIP users.

vipMaxWait.description: The maximum wait time in minutes for VIP users.

premiumMinWait.description: The minimum wait time in minutes for Premium users.

premiumMaxWait.description: The maximum wait time in minutes for Premium users.

RegistrationConfig.title: Registration Config
RegistrationConfig.description: Stores the secret code for app registration.

registrationSecret.description: A secret code that users must enter to register.

OfferConfig.title: Offer Config
OfferConfig.description: Stores the price for the VIP offer.

price.description: The formatted price string for the VIP offer (e.g., 'R$ 197').

VipRequest.title: VIP Access Request
VipRequest.description: Stores a user's request for VIP access after signing up through an affiliate link.

brokerId.description: The user's ID from the brokerage account.

userId.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

userEmail.description: The email of the user requesting access.

status.description: The current status of the VIP request.

submittedAt.description: The date and time when the request was submitted.

Affiliate.title: Affiliate
Affiliate.description: Stores information about an affiliate, including their custom checkout link.

checkoutUrl.description: The custom Hotmart checkout URL for this specific affiliate.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID is the user's Firebase UID.
Stores global application affiliate links. This is a single document.
Stores global application usage limits. This is a single document.
Stores global signal generation wait times. This is a single document.
Stores the global registration secret. This is a single document.
Stores the VIP offer price. This is a single document.
Stores VIP access requests from users inside the /app section. The document ID is the user's Firebase UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores custom checkout links for affiliates. Used in pages like /demo/vip. The document ID is the affiliate's code (e.g., 'wm').

params.name: affiliateId
params.description: The unique identifier for the affiliate.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to handle user profiles, VIP access requests, and global app configurations. The user's subscription status is now part of their profile. Global configurations are in single documents under /appConfig. The signalFeedbacks collection and entity have been removed to simplify the data model.
